name: TaskMaster 2000
description:
TaskMaster 2000 is the program you need to get your life together!

With the guidance of TaskMaster 2000's built-in assistant, Mugsy, help a budding freelancer organize her schedule for the month as she tries to balance work, family, friends, and her eccentric-yet-lovable boyfriend, Jerry. 

We hope you enjoy this humorous puzzle game, because we sure had fun making it for our third LudumDare!
